name: The Refuge (by Dead Pixel)
description:
Instructions:
W, A, S, D = Directional movement
Mouse = Move camera
Left click = Pick up, interact with objects, use objects

Overview:
Your plane has crashed and you are alone and lost!
Explore ‘Yelapa’ and try to contact help!
(Game Hint: Listen carefully to the audio)

Team Dead Pixel:
Designer – Charlie Smith
Programmers – George Honeywell, Kieran Grist
Artists – Krystal Webb, Shahnewaz ‘Bambi’ Choudhury

This jam took place 17/06/19 - 21/06/19
